WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 07.
1. F/V DORNEDA SANK IN 45-01S 060-04W. ONE PERSON
   MISSING. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
   TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO MRCC PUERTO BELGRANO,
   INMARSAT-C: 4700100125, PHONE: 5429 3248 7150,
   5429 3248 7162.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2252/18.
